response.overview: A village nestled in the mountains. Winter is harsh, Jules is struggling, and his only sun is Bachir. The two men love each other, yet Jules is suffering: his father, with whom he lives, is going through an insoluble grief and is lost in his delusions. It's time for Jules to accept that one cannot bend ties to one's will alone. Relationships fade while love, sometimes, remains.
response.title: Tu n'auras pas mes larmes
